description: This Dart source file defines a BudgetProvider class that manages budget data, providing CRUD operations with backend integration via an API client. It exposes methods to fetch, add, update, and remove budgets, and maintains state such as loading status and errors.

classes.name: BudgetProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages budget data and communicates with the backend API.

methods.name: fetchBudgets
methods.description: Fetches the list of budgets from the backend API and updates the local state.

methods.name: addBudget
methods.description: Creates a new budget, adds it to the local state, and posts it to the backend.

methods.name: updateBudget
methods.description: Updates an existing budget and synchronizes changes with the backend.

methods.name: removeBudget
methods.description: Removes a budget from local state and deletes it from the backend API.
